item.title: GitandCrumpets - THM
item.description: Git and Crumpets is a medium difficulty box from tryhackme which is mostly based on git. We get a shell on the box using a CVE in gitea’s git hooks functionality .For root, we change the permissions of the git user to root user. Now we were able to see a private repository owned by root which had root user’s ssh private key through which we login as root to get the root flag.
